Posts.EditableText:
I apologize if this is a obvious question.

How can I access the tutorial in Quest Pro 3.53?

Thank you!
Posts.HTML:
I apologize if this is a obvious question.

How can I access the tutorial in Quest Pro 3.53?

Thank you!

Posts.EditableText: In QDK Pro, click Help on the menu bar, then click Quest & QDK Manual. Much helpful information is to be found there!
Posts.HTML: In QDK Pro, click Help on the menu bar, then click Quest & QDK Manual. Much helpful information is to be found there!
